description:
Create Great Photos using Photoshop

This course is for anyone who wants their photographs to look the best they can be, Photographers who want to wow there friends and family.

We will learn how to merge two photos, clone object, mask elements, adjustment and colour corrections.

We will also look at the text tools, effects and Document sizing, plus loads more...

FInally we will combine all the methods learnt into one big tutorial

I Hope you enjoy this course and get invaluable help from it!
title: Create Great Holiday Pictures Using Photoshop CS6
